name: Uprooted (nyeeco)
description:
A 2D top-down maze game where you play as Sprout, a baby onion trying to find others that are like you. You navigate through the maze encountering enemies that try to block your path out.

Somewhere out there there are people just like you, you just got to find them!

Assets made by Janelle Villagracia, Jiana Yabao, and Nico King
Programming done by Grae Albino and Julius Lee.

Sound effects and music were retrieved from https://dova-s.jp/ .
